details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.7 Mathematical expressions - Alt and ActualText in Formula
details.description: All mathematical expressions shall be enclosed within a Formula tag as detailed in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.8.4.5 and shall have Alt or ActualText attributes
